items.key: ma_kn in (select ma_kn from dmtknhnsd where user_id = @@userID) and (ma_nh_dt = '{$%c[ma_nh_dt]}') and status = '1'
items.check: ma_kn in (select ma_kn from dmtknhnsd where user_id = @@userID) and (ma_nh_dt = '{$%c[ma_nh_dt]}')

dir.commands:
&XMLWhenFilterLoading; &XMLWhenFilterClosing;
declare @message nvarchar(4000) declare @bankCode varchar(32), @bankName nvarchar(128) select @message = '' if (select count(*) from dmnhdt where status = '1') = 1 begin select top 1 @bankCode = rtrim(ma_nh_dt), @bankName = case when @@language = 'v' then rtrim(ten_nh) else rtrim(ten_nh2) end from dmnhdt where status = '1' select @message = @message + 'initBank(this, ''' + @bankCode + ''', ''' + @bankName + ''');' end
select @message as message return
exec rs_rptBankingAccountBalance @ma_nh_dt, @tk_nh, @@language, @@userID, @@admin

action.text: declare @c int, @ma_kn char(16), @ten_kn nvarchar(128), @so_tk_nh varchar(32), @loai_kn varchar(32) select @c = 0, @ma_kn = '', @so_tk_nh = '', @loai_kn = '0' if exists(select 1 from dmknnh where ma_nh_dt = @ma_nh_dt) begin select @c = count(*) from dmknnh where ma_nh_dt = @ma_nh_dt and ma_kn in (select ma_kn from dmtknhnsd where user_id = @@userID) if @c = 1 select @ma_kn = a.ma_kn, @ten_kn = a.ten_kn%l, @so_tk_nh = a.so_tk_nh, @loai_kn = b.loai_kn from dmknnh a join dmnhdt b on a.ma_nh_dt = b.ma_nh_dt where a.ma_nh_dt = @ma_nh_dt and a.ma_kn in (select ma_kn from dmtknhnsd where user_id = @@userID) end select isnull(@c, 0) as c, rtrim(@ma_kn) as ma_kn, @ten_kn as ten_kn, @so_tk_nh as tk_nh, @loai_kn as loai_kn return

declare @so_tk_nh varchar(32) select @so_tk_nh = '' if exists(select 1 from dmknnh where ma_kn = @ma_kn) begin select @so_tk_nh = so_tk_nh from dmknnh where ma_kn = @ma_kn end select @so_tk_nh as tk_nh return
